title: PBE Signup Page Issues
body: So I've tried going to the PBE page several times and get the common 500 Error, I tried all the fixes that are usually recommended (Clearing Browser Cache/History or Using Either Hotspot Shield/Cyberghost), Even tried using the default Microsoft Edge, All gave me the 500 error

replies.body: We've received a few reports on this and is being looked into!  This error may be caused by a cache issue with your browser or how you're routing to the page.  Try clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to start or another browser entirely.  If that doesn't work, see if a VPN could help.  Hopefully that does the trick!

I'm a dummy and missed that you've already tried these steps.  Sorry about that!  There currently aren't any further steps than what's already been tried.  :(  This is still something that's being investigated, and I'll be sure to offer updates if I get any!  Let me know if you have any questions.
